original_text: Then I saw a second wild animal. This one was coming up out of the ground. It had two horns like a lamb's horns. But it spoke like a dragon.
korean_text: 내가 보매 또 다른 짐승이 땅에서 올라오니 어린 양 같이 두 뿔이 있고 용처럼 말을 하더라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw a second wild animal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 두 번째 짐승을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: This one was coming up out of the ground.
It had two horns like a lamb's horns.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 어린 양의 뿔 같은 두 개의 뿔을 가졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: But it spoke like a dragon.
